column3: Today is the day, my friend─Little Ladies' Day is finally upon us! Have you had the chance to enjoy everything it has to offer?
All the best things require a little extra help! If you're still willing to pitch in, please speak with one of my staff to see what you can do.

The Songbirds have added a great deal to the holiday cheer, haven't they? With everything going so splendidly, it makes me wonder what it was I ever had to be anxious about. You should be proud, my friend.
Come to see me dance? In that case, prepare yourself for an experience you'll never forget!
I've gone through it again and again. May every note I sing be in perfect harmony!
Every step I take on this stage has been choreographed to near perfection! If I do say so myself, it'll be something you'll regret missing.
Here for an autograph, I take it? Say no more! The twinkle in your eye tells me all that I need to know!

Oh, I can't believe no one wants our flyers. It's so frustrating, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! If only there was a strategy we could employ to get passersby to take them by the handful.
How are things faring on the streets, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? You look nearly as exhausted as I feel!
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, what do you think of these new outfits? I didn't believe it possible but I continue getting prettier by the day!
Do you see them, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─all those people coming to see us? Magnificent, isn't it?
If it isn't our flyer-distributing hero back from duty! Have you taken a look at all the new additions they've made to our stage?
Do you see all those people clamoring for my attention in the audience? My magical performance has attracted more onlookers than I can count!
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, have you seen the decorations that have been strung up around our stage? They're nearly as pretty as our new costumes!
There's been such a massive turnout and I couldn't be happier. I just wish that they would stop chanting my name! It makes me so nervous I sometimes forget how to breathe!
